dc.title: Congresswoman Yvette D. Clarke, 11th Congressional District of New York - Home Page
dc.description: Congresswoman Yvette Clarke represents New York in the U.S. House of Representatives. Yvette D. Clarke is a Brooklyn native whose roots are firmly planted in her Jamaican heritage. A product of the New York City Public School System, Rep. Clarke received a scholarship to Oberlin College and was a recipient of the prestigious APPAH/Sloan Fellowship in Public Policy and Policy Analysis.
